topic.title: Response On Scene Odometer Reading - conformance rules

section.p: Odometer reading for the EMS vehicle when the unit arrives at the patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11562 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.172"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11315)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10635)/@code="67485-3" Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --patient arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10636)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10637)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.20 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11315)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10635)/@code="67485-3" Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --patient arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10636)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10637)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.20 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.172" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67485-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --patient arrival"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation>
